description: Professor Sabark warns the Cadets that this is their last chance to take down PreCure. Knowing this, Sasolina asks for Kumojacky and Cobrajar`s Dark Bracelets.

titles.title: Sabaku no Shito ni mo Kokoro ga Attan Desuka!?
The Field Messengers Have Heart Flowers Too!?
さばくのしとにもこころがあったんですか!?
